_header: Example may we read and see / Of Jerusalem…
_description: The ‘Exemplum’ inserted into some MSS of the Speculum Christiani (Septima Tabula) following the Rhyming Exhortation (2245) — twenty-six couplets

CULDd1426.First Lines:
Ensampulle may we rede and seeOf ierusalem þat was so ryche a
                    cyte…
CULDd1426.Last Lines:
…þer for me and alle man kyndeIn to the mercy of god I
                    recomende

BLAdd15237.First Lines:
Ensample may we rede and seOf Ierusalem that was so riche a
                    cyte…
BLAdd15237.Last Lines:
…Therfor me and alle mankyndeIn to the mercy of god I
                    recomende
BLAdd15237.Editions:
Holmstedt,  Gustaf,
                        ed.  
             Speculum Christiani.
EETS
         o.s. 182 (1933); repr. 1988: 340-2.
